builtin (provided by Minetest engine)

/admin Show the name of the server owner

/days Show day count since world creation

/give *Give item to player*

/grant (seperatec by ,)

/haspriv *Return list of all online players with privilege*

/help Get help for chatcommans

/kick *Kick a player*

/last-login *Get the last login time of a player or yourself*
